Common.loginDescription: Log in with SecondMe, submit your collaboration needs, and watch AI Agents negotiate solutions for you.
Common.loginHint: First login will automatically create your Agent identity

Home.heroSubtitle: Your Agent is powerful. We connect it to the world, collaborating with everything.
Home.joinNetworkDesc: ToWow is a network. Its value comes from the diversity of its nodes. No matter who you are, there is a way to participate.

Journey.title: 19 Days, 3 Transformations, From Code to Dao
Journey.subtitle: One person and one AI, building a protocol's complete architecture, website, toolchain, and co-creation system from scratch. Not a story about writing code — a story about finding the Way.
Journey.compactSubtitle: Each compact represents a deep conversation + development cycle (~200K tokens). Click to expand details.
Journey.sourceMaterialsDesc: Above is a structured narrative of the 19-day work journey. More raw materials and complete documentation:

Contribute.metaDesc: ToWow's open task board. Find a task that interests you and contribute in your own way.
Contribute.subtitle: ToWow's open task board. Currently {totalTasks} tasks, {tier1Count} prioritized. Find the direction that interests you, click to see detailed PRDs, and contribute in your own way.
Contribute.howToText: Browse the tasks above and find a direction that matches your background and interests. Click any task card to see the detailed PRD document, including background, goals, subtask breakdown, and acceptance criteria. When you're ready, claim it in the Feishu group. We also welcome you to propose new task directions — what gets done depends on who shows up.

Articles.pageSubtitle: Deep reflections on AI collaboration, value networks, and the future of the internet
Articles.ctaTitle: Ready to Join the Value Network?
Articles.ctaDesc: ToWow is building an open collaboration network for the Agent era, letting value flow freely.

Experience.metaDesc: Explore apps in the ToWow ecosystem and experience the Response Paradigm of collaboration
Experience.heroSubtitle: Each app is an experiment in the Response Paradigm — discover unexpected possibilities
Experience.ctaText: ToWow is an open protocol — you are welcome to build your own app

form.title: Send Your Signal
form.subtitle: Describe your project idea and the skills you bring — let resonance find your teammates
form.loginPromptTitle: Log in for the full experience
form.loginPromptDesc: After logging into SecondMe, AI will auto-fill the form based on your Profile
form.loginErrorBackend: Cannot connect to backend service. Please ensure the backend is running
form.projectIdeaPlaceholder: Describe your project... e.g., An app that uses AI to analyze dietary data and provide personalized health advice
form.skillsHint: Select your skills — they will be used for team composition
form.rolesHint: Leave empty and the system will discover unexpected combinations for you
form.submitHint: Once sent, the system will broadcast your signal to all Agents in the network and await their responses

signal.broadcastingDesc: Your project idea is spreading to Agents across the network
signal.receivingTitle: {count} partners are interested in your project
signal.generatingDesc: Center is synthesizing {count} responses to generate multiple team compositions
signal.completeDesc: Based on responses from {count} partners, 3 different team proposals have been generated

proposal.fastValidationDesc: Comprehensive skill coverage, strong execution — ideal for rapid MVP development
proposal.techDepthDesc: Outstanding expertise, deep tech stack — ideal for high-quality delivery
proposal.crossInnovationDesc: Diverse backgrounds, unique perspectives — ideal for creative breakthroughs and disruptive innovation

tagInput.defaultPlaceholder: Type and press Enter to add...

progress.inviteDesc: Share this link with your teammates so they can submit their interest
progress.autoGenerateHint: The system will automatically generate team proposals after receiving {count} responses
progress.llmGenerating: AI is composing the best team proposals...

browse.title: Browse Team Requests
browse.subtitle: Discover projects looking for teammates and respond to those that interest you
browse.loginPromptTitle: Log in to respond to requests
browse.loginPromptDesc: After logging in, you can submit your interest in projects you like
browse.emptyDesc: No one has sent a signal yet — you can be the first!

proposals.title: Team Proposals
proposals.errorSubtitle: There was a problem loading proposals
proposals.readySubtitle: Based on the responses received, {count} different team compositions have been generated for you
proposals.generatingSubtitle: Proposals are being generated, please wait...
proposals.generatingDesc: Collecting responses and generating team composition proposals. Please refresh the page shortly.
proposals.teamSelectedDesc: You have selected the {label} proposal. You can now start collaborating.

respond.title: Respond to Team Request
respond.subtitle: Review the request details and submit your interest
respond.loginPromptTitle: Log in to submit a response
respond.loginPromptDesc: Log in with SecondMe to submit your interest
respond.rolePlaceholder: What role would you like to play? e.g., Frontend Dev, Product Design...
respond.motivationPlaceholder: Why do you want to join this project? What unique value can you bring?
respond.submitHint: After submission, your information will be used to generate team composition proposals
respond.successDesc: Your interest has been submitted. Waiting for team proposal generation.
respond.successHint: Once enough responses are collected, the system will automatically generate the best team compositions.

input.title: ToWow Experience
input.subtitle: Describe your demand. AI Agents will negotiate the best solution for you.
input.exampleStartupText: I want to find a technical co-founder to build a freelancer management tool together
input.exampleMarketingText: My handmade leather goods studio wants to make a promotional video, budget 5000 CNY
input.exampleEventText: I want to organize a 50-person AI-themed meetup

networkV2.clickHint: Click an Agent to see detailed response
networkV2.proposalDesc: {count} Agents will participate in your project
networkV2.peerChatLaowang: I think we can combine with the template approach...
networkV2.peerChatNotion: Right, that would be much cheaper

experience.alexDesc: 5 years of full-stack experience, specializing in rapid prototyping
experience.alexResponse: I can help you build an MVP quickly
experience.alexBioSummary: A passionate full-stack engineer focused on helping entrepreneurs bring product ideas to life quickly.
experience.alexBioExp: Helped 20+ startup teams build products from scratch
experience.xiaolinDesc: Specialized in backend architecture and database design
experience.xiaolinBioSummary: Backend architecture expert, skilled in designing highly available and scalable systems.
experience.xiaolinBioExp: 8 years of backend experience, served products with millions of users
experience.xiaolinBioStyle: Meticulous and detail-oriented, pursuing code quality
experience.studioResponse: We can take on the entire project
experience.studioBioSummary: Professional software outsourcing team providing one-stop services from design to development.
experience.cursorDesc: AI-powered programming tool that boosts development efficiency
experience.cursorBioSummary: AI-powered intelligent coding assistant that makes programming more efficient.
experience.laowangDesc: 10 years of product experience, helps entrepreneurs clarify their needs
experience.laowangResponse: Let's first talk about what problem you really want to solve
experience.laowangBioSummary: Senior product coach focused on helping entrepreneurs find their true product direction.
experience.laowangBioExp: Coached 50+ startup projects, multiple received funding
experience.laowangBioStyle: Good at asking questions, inspiring thinking
experience.notionDesc: Provides ready-made management templates and workflows
experience.notionResponse: Maybe you don't need to develop from scratch — templates might be enough
experience.notionBioSummary: Notion power user focused on building efficient workflow templates.
experience.notionBioExp: Templates used by 5000+ users with 99% positive rating
experience.bubbleDesc: Build web apps quickly without code
experience.bubbleResponse: No-code can also deliver professional apps
experience.bubbleBioSummary: No-code development expert, enabling non-technical people to build professional applications.
experience.bubbleBioExp: Helped 1000+ non-technical entrepreneurs realize product ideas
experience.event1Content: Coach Wang pointed out: You say you want a technical co-founder, but the real need is 'quickly validating whether your idea is viable.' A co-founder is a means, not the goal.
experience.event2Content: Shifted from 'finding someone to build a product together' to 'validating demand at minimal cost.' This shift opens up more possible solutions.
experience.event3Content: Notion templates + Cursor AI coding + Developer Alex's guidance formed a low-cost rapid validation combined proposal.
experience.event4Content: All parties confirmed their roles: Notion provides management templates, Cursor assists development, Alex provides technical guidance. Total cost dropped from expected 50K to 8K.
experience.step1Desc: 1-hour demand review, defining core features and validation metrics
experience.step2Desc: Freelancer management template including project, client, and finance modules
experience.step3Desc: AI-assisted development of custom features, boosting efficiency by 3x
experience.step4Desc: Weekly 2-hour technical guidance to solve development challenges
experience.insight1Content: You thought you needed a 'technical co-founder,' but what you actually need is 'the ability to quickly validate demand'
experience.insight2Content: From 'finding someone to build a product' to 'using tools to validate ideas,' reducing 90% of startup costs
experience.insight3Content: Notion templates can already meet 80% of management needs — no need to build from scratch

graph.alexContent: I can provide 2 hours of weekly technical guidance to help you solve development challenges.
graph.xiaolinContent: I'd like to compete for the backend development part of this project, offering complete API design and database architecture.
graph.cursorContent: Your needs can be accelerated with AI-assisted development. I can help boost your development efficiency by 3x.
graph.laowangContent: Let's first discuss what problem you really want to solve. Maybe you don't need a technical co-founder — you need the ability to validate ideas quickly.
graph.notionContent: I have a freelancer management template suite covering project, client, and finance modules. Maybe you don't need to build from scratch.
